title: You should just rip Fiora's arms and legs off too.
body:
You nerfed Fiora so hard...

It gave everyone I beat in the past time to cheer for the nerf because they are bad at the game.

Saying she was overpowered is your cop out for nerfing my main. 

But really deep down you all know I'm just a better player than you guys when I'd get my level 1 pentakills and 40 and 0 scores.

She wasn't overpowered.  Zed's ult would still rip her up.  Garen still countered her. 
Raamus countered her among others but you weren't happy.

You only way to become a better player was to destroy my main to target me personally for being better than all of you.

That's right...

You might think me delusional but Riot banned me from ranked at the exact same time of the Fiora rework.
Not because I was bad or misbehaved but because I was too good and they didn't understand it.

Who get's banned from ranked alone?   Not many people get that.
It was a message to me that my days owning you guys are over.

They want me to go home so they destroyed the 1st E-sport to pick on me. 

Shame on you Riot.

Just because I can beat all your LCS players doesn't mean you should destroy the game to pigeon hole me.

It's not even as much about her ult as it is her double lunge.

Fiora's double lunge is what makes Fiora...  Fiora Riot. 

You put a timer on it and gave her a plecebo ult destroying the champ. 

Maybe the rest of the build is cool but you certainly destroyed Fiora and ruined the 1st e-sport.
